rrr

Expand Feature Space

expand_feature_space

expand_feature_space(feature_space)

Arguments

feature_space
a matrix or data frame of input variables

Value

data frame of all input variables, their squares and all cross products

Examples

data(iris)
iris_features <- iris[,1:4]
expand_feature_space(iris)
#> Warning: ‘^’ not meaningful for factors
#> # A tibble: 150 × 10
#>    sepal.length sepal.width petal.length petal.width        type

#> 8           5.0         3.4          1.5         0.2 Iris-setosa
